text: Paola Verenice Pabón Caranqui (born 28 January 1978) is an Ecuadorian lawyer and politician who is running for President of Ecuador in the 2025 general election. She was a member of the National Assembly for the PAIS Alliance movement from 2009 and 2015. In 2019, she was elected Prefect of Pichincha Province. In June 2024, Pabón registered to run for the Citizen Revolution Movement presidential nomination in the upcoming 2025 general election. ==References== Category:1978 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Quito Category:Ecuadorian lawyers
title: Paola Pabón
